summary: REQ-53 is partially implemented by applying a dark-mode body background image in `frontend/src/index.css`, but REQ-52 is not met because the required image asset was not added. The diff also includes broader global theme/color-variable changes that were not explicitly requested.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add a new premium, high-resolution dark-mode fintech background image under `frontend/public/assets/generated/` with the exact filename `banking-bg-dark-india.dim_3840x2160.png`, containing no people/text/logos/watermarks and matching the specified India-focused palette and style.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows no added files, and specifically no new PNG asset under `frontend/public/assets/generated/`. Only CSS references the expected path.
evidence: frontend/src/index.css (references `/assets/generated/banking-bg-dark-india.dim_3840x2160.png` but does not add it)

hallucinated_features.description: Broad replacement/adjustment of the global color system (many OKLCH CSS variables for light and dark themes) beyond simply applying the requested background image.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest focuses on generating and applying a background image while avoiding redesign/layout changes beyond whatâ€™s necessary for readability. The diff shows extensive updates to theme variables not directly tied (in the diff) to background application or contrast fixes.
